targets.expr: topk(15, label_replace(sum by(service, method, code) (rate(traefik_service_requests_total{code=~"2..", protocol="http"}[5m])), "service", "$1", "service", "([^-]+-[^-]+).*")) > 0
topk(15, label_replace(sum by(service, method, code) (rate(traefik_service_requests_total{code=~"5..", protocol="http"}[5m])), "service", "$1", "service", "([^-]+-[^-]+).*")) > 0
topk(15, label_replace(sum by(service, method, code) (rate(traefik_service_requests_total{code!~"2..|5..", protocol="http"}[5m])), "service", "$1", "service", "([^-]+-[^-]+).*")) > 0
